        public static void run(HibiscusSourceSelection hibiscusSourceSelection,
                       java.util.List<HibiscusSourceSelection.CheckTaskPair> tasks,
                       com.fluidops.fedx.cache.Cache cache)
        /** Execute the given list of tasks in parallel, and block the thread until all tasks are completed. Synchronization is achieved by means of a latch. Results are added to the map of the source selection instance. Errors are reported as OptimizationException instances.
        Parameters:
        hibiscusSourceSelection - Source Selection
        tasks - Set of SPARQL ASK tasks
        cache - Cache
